verbs.description: [ARG1: The French president] [V: is] [ARG2: in Washington] [ARGM-PRP: for the first official state visit of the Trump presidency] . During a joint press conference in the Oval Office , Trump brushed alleged dandruff off Macron ’s shoulder .

The French president is in Washington for the first official state visit of the Trump presidency . [ARGM-TMP: During a joint press conference in the Oval Office] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: brushed] [ARG1: alleged dandruff] [ARG2: off Macron ’s shoulder] .

The French president is in Washington for the first official state visit of the Trump presidency . During a joint press conference in the Oval Office , Trump brushed [V: alleged] [ARG1: dandruff] off Macron ’s shoulder .
